adviseScripts.text: Have you heard the proverb, "A pear drops when a crow flies from the tree"?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It's fine if you don't understand what it means, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Tell me. What would you do if I blasted that crow out of the sky?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I'd go pick up the pear.
I'd say, "Bye bye, Crow."
Very good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You're smarter than you look.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I must say, you do amuse me from time to time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Your courtesy can't hide your amusing lack of sense.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Tsk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I hang out with Haran to continue amusing her.
How does it feel living in that anthill you call the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Are you really happy sheltered under that false sense of security?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Or does the thought of the sky caving in at any moment fill you with terror?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: No matter where you are, it's all more or less the same.
I knew you would have nothing intelligent to say.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: That's why I beckoned you here to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: This way you can live up on the surface, in this utopia.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Everywhere is the same?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: How can you say that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: How can you compare human land to that vulgar place?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You begin to irritate me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Harran a bit more.
Noah is such an arrogant child.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: There are rumors that she has been perturbing my crow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: What would you have me do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You ought to teach her a lesson.
You're an adult, so you should rise above all this and forgive her.
Teach her lesson...
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If I were on the receiving end, corporal punishment would not seem desirable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I suddenly feel as if I have been swayed by this child. Give me another idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Wise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I mustn't allow myself to be affected by such childish acts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Very well, I will forgive her. Just for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Harran a bit more, thinking about Noah.
Isabel has always been a good follower of yours, yes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: She was always taken with you before, but it's gotten worse lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Tell me, what is it about you that has made her like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: My devilish good looks?
My charming personality?
You are very confident in yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text:
I suppose that could be the reason.
However, I'm no longer interested in this conversation. Let's not discuss it any further.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I must admit...
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: your way of thinking is rather novel.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: That is why I'm fond of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Harran a bit more, thinking about Isabel.
You said that you were part of the Central Government, yes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: How is it, working for them? Any fun?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It's fine.
It's a real drag.
It's... fine?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I didn't expect you to enjoy something so despicable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I can't tell if it's merely because you are so good that you rise above it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: or if you really do revel in the filth along with them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Is that so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It is as I thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You're different from the rest of those filthy cretins.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I hear more about Haran's hatred towards the Central Government.
The Outpost is quite an interesting place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It's neither part of the Ark nor the surface, yet it's full of Nikkes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Are you happy being here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I am.
I am not.
How boring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Is it that you're greedy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Or have you just given up already?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Of course you aren't.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It doesn't have any wide-open spaces like the surface, nor a real sky.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You'll just have to wait a bit longer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: One day I'll let you live up on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I talk more with Harran about the Outpost.
Tell me the truth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Do you agree that I am the most important thing in the world?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I do.
Yes. Good. That is how you should be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I've told you to hide nothing from me, and I know you will do whatever I say, so I believe you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You are indeed qualified to stand by my side.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I see. Then your belief in me is not firm enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless, it could be worse.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you had said no, I would never let you lay eyes on me again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I spend some meaningful time together with Harran.
Now, a question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: What flavor do you think I would like?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Nothing could satisfy you.
The taste of blood?
How did you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: That's correct. I have no strong preference when it comes to flavor, good or bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I can tell that you are quite interested in me. Is that right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I like that very much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Blood?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I don't go around splashing blood everywhere.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I prefer a clean kill, yet you say I like blood?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If this is your attempt at humor, then I'm not laughing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I talk more with Harran about taste.
As you know, my weapon was crafted on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Do you think the weaponry from the Ark
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: can compare to mine?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Yes.
No.
How foolish of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Is this because you're from the Ark?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You amuse me, but don't get too smart with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I'm not above making an example out of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Precisely.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: They're in completely different leagues. How could you possibly compare them?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Never forget that this powerful weapon of mine is at your service.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I talk more with Harran about weapons.
Do you remember the first time I came to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: How did you feel?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I was happy.
It was incredible.
As you should be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You must have been beside yourself with excitement.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: In that case, you may stay with me a bit longer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Incredible?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Hm. I suppose it would be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You haven't met anyone like me in your entire life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I understand your feelings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I reminisce with Harran about the first time we met.
What's your favorite kind of weather?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Wait, is there even such a thing as the weather in that dismal hole you call a city?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: We have artificial weather.
You must be joking.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: How can you compare that to the real thing?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: They're worlds apart.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Don't feel so down.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you want, I'll take you up to the surface and
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: show you everything. The snow, the rain...
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Harran and I have a conversation about the weather.
Why do humans constantly lie
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: and betray one another?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Not everyone is that way.
I don't know what to say.
I realize that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: And I know you represent one of those humans.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: So you don't need to worry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to say anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Do you think I don't know there are plenty of humans who don't act like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I am well aware of the type of human you are.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: So do not be foolish and feel ashamed when you have nothing to be ashamed about.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Harran and I have a conversation about humans and their penchant for lying.
Follower,
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: who is the fairest of them all?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: ... Snow White?
You.
Are you serious?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Snow White? The one who wanders around wearing those tattered rags?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it could be Dorothy...
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: No, that's not it either.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Did Snow White put you up to this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Tell me the truth.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Haha, you're very perceptive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You told me exactly what I wanted to hear, and I didn't have to spell it out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You know how to put me in a good mood.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Harran and I decide to try and make a poisonous apple, like the one from Snow White.
You must be hungry by now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Would you like me to make some witch's brew?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: No, thanks.
Yes, please.
I refuse to believe you don't want to try my witch's brew.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Are you just being polite and saying you're not hungry?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Well, don't be.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: My goodness, not even a polite refusal. You must be starving.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: How adorable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I pounded down several bowls of the soup Harran gave me.
This is the new perfume I concocted.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Spray-spray-spray-
Well, what do you think? Am I more captivating now?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Very much so.
You've always been endlessly alluring, Harran.
Hmm... You're saying all the right words, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: somehow I feel like you're just telling me what I want to hear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It wasn't the answer I was looking for, but I like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Compliments are always nicer when they're unexpected.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I continue to shower Harran with compliments.
What I like most about the surface is that
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: it's truly survival of the fittest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Don't you agree?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Absolutely.
I'm not sure.
Hehe, your face tells me you're not so sure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You don't have to pretend to understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: It's easy to see that you're at the bottom of the food chain.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, yes, I imagine you don't quite understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: That kind of honesty is what I like about you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Harran and I have a conversation about the rules of nature.
Follower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Do you think we'll ever see the day where there are no Raptures on the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I believe we will.
I'm not too sure.
Yes...perhaps one day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Rather than risking your life for no reason,
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: it's better to have a dream to work towards, no matter how implausible it may seem.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You must keep believing in that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you have any uncertainty,
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: that means you're risking your life without even knowing exactly why you're doing it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You poor thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Harran about reclaiming the surface.
A few days ago I encountered an abandoned Nikke up on the surface who was on the verge of death.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Do you know what she said to me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: She wanted to return to the time before she was a Nikke.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever wanted to go back to the past?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Sure, there are times when I've wanted to go back.
For me, the past should remain in the past.
But what good does getting lost in the past do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you're unhappy with your past, then make up for it in the here and now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: There's no point in trying to go back and fix what has already happened.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you're unhappy with your past, then make up for it in the here and now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you ever feel like doing that, let me know.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I'll do whatever I can to help.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Harran reminiscing about the past.
Follower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer red or blue?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Red.
Blue.
Hehe, we think alike.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you said that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I want to make this next bottle of perfume red.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Tsk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: If you'd said red, I was going to pretend as if I had no choice but to change the color.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: But fine, I guess it's blue yet again.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I helped Harran make perfume.
Between you and my raven,
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: who do you think makes a better follower?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: ... The raven.
Of course it's me.
Hmmm? Why are you so down?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: You're a perfectly fine follower.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: So chin up, and believe in yourself a little more.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Where do you get such confidence?
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, very well then.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: I'm not sure about everything else, but at the very least, I enjoy that you're more confident than my raven.
adviseScripts.speaker: Harran

adviseScripts.text: Harran and I have a conversation about the duties of a follower, and of her raven.
